title: sattiyattirkku
sahitya:
sattiyattirkku jAti mathamillai sandEham En manamE


anupallavi

  shuddhAnma uNarcciyE nittiya vEdam shollAl ezhundadellAm avaravar bhEdam


caraNam    gItai upaniSadam kristu mozhi kuraL kEDarum uNmaiyai nADurum vazhigaLE
pAdai palavEnum paTTaNam onrE parisittup-pAruLLE pArppAnai nanrE
